question: 購買
sourceMnemonic: If you create <kanji>subscription</kanji>s to <kanji>buy</kanji> things, you're probably in the <vocabulary>purchasing</vocabulary> department. It's your responsibility to set up subscriptions and buy everything for everyone else because you're the purchasing person.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is on'yomi, which is great for <ja>購</ja> but not as great for <ja>買</ja>. Luckily, the reading for <ja>買</ja> is <reading>buy</reading> (<ja>ばい</ja>), which is the same as the meaning, which is a pretty awesome coincidence.
